head.title: Extract barcodes from {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{ProgLang}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdShortName}} to read and extract barcode data from {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{ProgLang}} without needing extra tools.

header.title: Extract barcodes from {{FileFormatUp}} using {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Read and extract barcode information from documents like PDF, Word, Excel, and images using {{ProdShortName}} in your {{EnvNameShort}} projects.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a flexible document parsing library for {{EnvName}} developers that supports text, image, and structured data extraction. It includes powerful barcode reading features to detect and extract barcode values from documents and image formats like PDF, Word, Excel, JPG, PNG, and more â€” without any third-party software.

formats.title: Supported formats for barcode extraction
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports barcode recognition in a wide range of document and image formats. Check below for commonly supported types.

examples.comment_1: Load the document with barcodes using the {{textParser}} class
examples.comment_2: Check if the file supports barcode extracting
examples.comment_3: The file doesn't support barcode extracting

steps.title: Steps to extract barcodes from {{FileformatCap}} in {{ProgLang}}

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy to collect barcodes from {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{EnvName}} applications with just a few steps.
content.step_2: Make sure the document supports barcodes.
content.step_3: Get list of barcodes from the document.
content.step_4: Loop through the results and use the extracted values.

more_features.title: Advanced document parsing features
more_features.description: In addition to barcode recognition, {{ProdShortName}} lets you extract raw text, images, and structured content for deeper analysis and automation.

feature_1.title: Multiple barcode formats
feature_1.content: Supports popular barcode types such as QR Code, Code 128, Data Matrix, EAN, Aztec, and more.

feature_2.title: Barcode from images or documents
feature_2.content: Extract barcode data not only from PDFs and Office files but also from image formats like JPEG, PNG, and BMP.

feature_3.title: Flexible extraction options
feature_3.content: Control how barcodes are detected with advanced options including region-based scanning and multi-page document support.

code_1.title: How to extract barcode from a PDF using barcode options
code_1.content: This example shows how to get barcodes from a PDF document using specific barcode options.
code_1.comment_1: Load the PDF document to the {{textParser}}
code_1.comment_2: Check if the document supports barcodes extraction
code_1.comment_3: Narrow list of barcodes using options.
